extendedInfo.description: caseball Be part of Chocohero's brave rescue!Your mission: Help Chipster save his friends and the world...Stop, drop, and roll right into an action-packed world of luscious sweets in this cute, free-falling thrill ride: Chocohero!Smoresdom, the land of treats and chocolate, is in danger! Cakems, guards of this sweet kingdom, hold the adorable, innocent Chocobits as prisoners.Chipster, the wobbly chocolate hero will roll right in to rescue his Chocobit friends.Simply tilt your device left and right to guide Chipster as he rolls down to rescue his friends. Bump the Cakems to crumble them and free the Chocobits!Help Chipster's friends escape before it's too late. Boosts and tornado skills will crush your enemies and freeze time to help you escape before the pouring milk reaches you!Free all his friends and save Smoresdom!Sweet Features and Highlights!âSimple and Easy Controls--Anyone can enjoy the play one-touch or tilt control~! âItems & Upgrades-- Magnets, clocks, gift boxes... Use many power-up items that will help you out throughout the game.-- Collect coins to upgrade for more powerful fun~!âObjectives-- Complete various objectives to get Chipster a longer cape.-- The longer the cape, the more powerful he gets!ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.title: Cuteness, persistence and glitches
reviews.comment: The gameplay is super fun and adorable.  ----PROBLEMS------  At first the app wont even open on my galaxy pocket but i kept reinstalling it then it started working but now it keeps closing.  Please fix this so I may play with  the ultra cute hero!!
reviews.author: Martina Lea\303\261o

reviews.title: 3 stars
reviews.comment: Hangs and force closes on my S2 for some reason. Seems to hog the RAM quickly. Fun game otherwise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hard to clear objective
reviews.comment: This is really really adorable it made me smile and all the details of animations, great entertainment! But it\'s kinda hard to pass through stages to meet objective, I\'ve never cross over world 3 and never able to meet my second objective I don\'t see where I\'ve gone wrong .
reviews.author: Clyde Boo

reviews.title: Cute but...idk
reviews.comment: Cute but the game is boring. All there is, is to keep falling and trying to save all the chocos in the path. Two star rating for cuteness.
reviews.author: Jamie Alterna
